pageContext.claim: “No, wind's not so good. And you know, you have no idea how expensive it is to make those things. They're all made in China and Germany, by the way, just in case you -- we don't make them here, essentially. We don't make them here.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong when he claims China and Germany are manufacturing "all" wind turbines. In 2018, the top manufacturer was Vestas, based in Denmark, according to bizvibe.com; it has manufacturing facilities North and Latin America, Europe and Asia. General Electric, based in United States, is in fourth place.
